description: This table contains the edit history for patient's preferred lab, including the lab, edit action, edit user, and instant of edit.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LAB_EDIT_ACT_HX_C_NAME
columns.description:
This column contains the category value corresponding to the edit action taken on the patient's preferred labs.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Add


Remove

columns.name: LAB_EDIT_USR_HX_ID
columns.description: This column contains the user ID corresponding to the edit action taken on the patient's preferred labs.

columns.name: LAB_EDIT_IN_HX_DTTM
columns.description: The instant the edit action was taken on the patient's preferred labs.
